name: Last Treasure Hunt
description:
Last Treasure Hunt was made for the "I Can't Write" game jam in two weeks.

Follow through the clues to find out what happened to her friend Finn and a secret reunion with Greg . A moving interactive fiction that brings all three childhood friends back together after years of separation.

Emily, Greg and Finn were three friends who loves to play tabletop games together. They would always play on the weekend at Finn's place. Life was good. Until Emily and Greg have to say goodbyes and move to study abroad.

WASD to move

Click to interact

ESC to quit to menu screen

After you played, please fill out this form:

https://forms.gle/tk3VpFTwnqqFjVks6

This form includes questions about your experience, feedbacks and will not collect any personal data.

PLAY TO WIN:

Play now and get a big chance to not get the Official Unofficial Last Treasure Hunt TTRPG set for FREE ( Not available in any store near you).

Box set includes: 

A bag of your blood type. ( don't ask how we know)

Vampirism? 

Playable Cabbage Merchant.

A whole bunch of bizarre adventure.

Pancake recipe.

One million dollars. 

Last Treasure Hunt was made by a group of two:

Design by me.

Art by Arti.
